TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NetMsmqBinding extends System.ServiceModel.MsmqBindingBase

summary.span: 表示適合跨電腦通訊的佇列繫結。

span.span: Represents a queued binding that is suitable for cross-machine communication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 繫結使用訊息佇列 (MSMQ) 做為傳輸，提供佇列的支援，並可支援結合鬆散的應用程式、失敗隔離、負載平均和中斷連接作業。The binding provides support for queuing by using Message Queuing (MSMQ) as a transport and enables support for loosely-coupled applications, failure isolation, load leveling and disconnected operations. 如需這些功能的討論，請參閱[佇列概觀](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/queues-overview.md)。For a discussion of these features, see [Queues Overview](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/queues-overview.md). 這是由 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 提供的其中一種系統提供繫結。This is one of the system-provided bindings provided by [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)]. 建議的程序為使用組態值來定義繫結，且不使用程式碼的方法，除了在初始化服務時必須設定組態值的特定進階情況中。The recommended procedure is to define the binding using configuration values and not to use a code-based approach, except in certain advanced scenarios where configuration values must be set as a service is initialized. ## Examples 下列範例說明如何設定服務以使用 繫結。The following example shows how to configure a service to use the binding. 首先是組態檔。First, the configuration file. 接著是實際的服務程式碼。Next, the actual service code. [!code-csharp[S_Msmq_Default#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_msmq_default/cs/service.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S_Msmq_Default#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_msmq_default/vb/service.vb#1)] [!code-csharp[S_Msmq_Default#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_msmq_default/cs/service.cs#2)] [!code-vb[S_Msmq_Default#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_msmq_default/vb/service.vb#2)] [!code-csharp[S_Msmq_Default#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_msmq_default/cs/hostapp.cs#10)] [!code-vb[S_Msmq_Default#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_msmq_default/vb/hostapp.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個名稱會覆寫任何組態名稱，在執行階段指派給`NetMsmqBinding`組態檔中的項目。This name overwrites any configuration name at runtime that was assigned to the `NetMsmqBinding` element in a configuration file. ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何產生 類別的執行個體。The following code shows how to instantiate an instance of class. [!code-csharp[S_UENetMsmqBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenetmsmqbinding/cs/service.cs#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection CreateBindingElements() cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreateBindingElements () As BindingElementCollection

summary.span: 傳回包含在目前繫結中繫結項目的已排序集合。

span.span: Returns an ordered collection of binding elements contained in the current binding.

returns.span: 由 繫結描述的繫結項目之已排序集合。

span.span: The ordered collection of binding elements described by the binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 繫結項目的順序很重要。The order of the binding elements is important. 它會反映建構及堆疊通訊協定和傳輸通道的順序。It reflects the order in which the protocol and transport channels are constructed and stacked. 這個繫結項目的集合是新的集合，可以修改後用於建立 。This collection of binding elements is a new collection and can be modified and then used to create a . ## Examples 下列程式碼會建立 `NetMsmqBinding` 並呼叫 `CreateBindingElements`，然後列印 `BindingElements` 集合之中各個繫結項目的名稱。The following code creates a `NetMsmqBinding` and calls `CreateBindingElements`, and then prints out the name of each binding element in the `BindingElements` collection. [!code-csharp[S_UENetMsmqBinding#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenetmsmqbinding/cs/snippets.cs#3)]

span.span: Gets the version of SOAP that is used for messages processed by this binding.

span.span: The value of the that is used with this binding.
The default value is SOAP 1.2.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何取得 。The following code shows how to get the . [!code-csharp[S_UENetMsmqBinding#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenetmsmqbinding/cs/snippets.cs#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property long MaxBufferPoolSize { long get(); void set(long value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定配置供從通道接收訊息之訊息緩衝區管理員使用的最大記憶體量。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum amount of memory that is allocated for use by the message buffer manager that receives messages from the channel.

value.span: 可供訊息緩衝區管理員使用的最大記憶體量，單位為位元組。

span.span: The maximum amount of memory, in bytes, available for use by the message buffer manager.
The default value is 524288 (0x80000) bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 利用緩衝區集區將使用緩衝區的成本降至最低。The minimizes the cost of using buffers by using a buffer pool. 當訊息從通道送出時，服務將需要緩衝區來處理訊息。Buffers are required to process messages by the service when they come out of the channel. 如果緩衝區集區中沒有足夠的記憶體可以處理訊息負載， 就必須從 CLR 堆積配置額外的記憶體，進而增加記憶體回收負荷。If there is not sufficient memory in the buffer pool to process the message load, the must allocate additional memory from the CLR heap, which increases the garbage collection overhead. 從 CLR 記憶體回收堆積所產生的大量配置表示緩衝區集區太小，而提高 上限來提供較大的配置便可改善效能。Extensive allocation from the CLR garbage heap is an indication that the buffer pool size is too small and that performance can be improved with a larger allocation by increasing the limit. ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何設定 屬性。The following code shows how to set the property. [!code-csharp[S_UENetMsmqBinding#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenetmsmqbinding/cs/snippets.cs#4)]

summary.span: 取得或設定列舉值，這個值表示此繫結所使用的佇列通訊通道傳輸。

span.span: Gets or sets an enumeration value that indicates the queued communication channel transport that this binding uses.

value.span: 這個繫結所使用佇列管理員之間的傳輸。

span.span: The transport between queue managers that this binding uses.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用 SOAP Reliable Messaging Protocol 時，訊息佇列 (MSMQ) 不支援 Active Directory 定址，因此當 設定為 時，請勿將 設定為 或 `true`。Message Queuing (MSMQ) does not support Active Directory addressing when using SOAP Reliable Messaging Protocol, so do not set to or when is set to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何設定 屬性。The following code shows how to set the property. [!code-csharp[S_UENetMsmqBinding#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenetmsmqbinding/cs/snippets.cs#5)]

span.span: Gets or sets the that is associated with this binding.
The associated with this binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會定義 SOAP 訊息複雜度的條件約束 (Constraint)，這些條件約束可由使用繫結所設定的端點處理。The object defines constraints on the complexity of SOAP messages that can be processed by endpoints configured with a binding. 這些條件約束包括 `maxArrayLength`、`maxBytesPerRead`、`maxDepth`、`maxNameTableCharCount` 和 `maxStringContentLength`。These constraints include `maxArrayLength`, `maxBytesPerRead`, `maxDepth`, `maxNameTableCharCount`, and `maxStringContentLength`. 這些值有助於防止阻絕服務攻擊。These values aid in the prevention of denial of service attacks. [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] 。 . ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何設定 屬性。The following code shows how to set the property. [!code-csharp[S_UENetMsmqBinding#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenetmsmqbinding/cs/snippets.cs#2)]

span.span: The value is .

span.span: Gets or sets the that is associated with this binding.
The that is associated with this binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是訊息佇列 (MSMQ) 傳輸和 SOAP 安全性的封裝。 is an encapsulation of both Message Queuing (MSMQ) transport and SOAP security. 它指定是否啟用傳輸或 SOAP 安全性，以及如果啟用，正在使用的驗證模式和保護層級。It specifies whether transport or SOAP security is enabled and, if so, what authentication mode and protection levels are in use. ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何取得 物件。The following code shows how to get the object. [!code-csharp[S_UENetMsmqBinding#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenetmsmqbinding/cs/snippets.cs#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseActiveDirectory { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 傳回或設定值，這個值表示是否應該使用 Active Directory 來轉換佇列位址。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether queue addresses should be converted using Active Directory.

value.span: 如果應該使用 Active Directory 來轉換佇列位址，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if queue addresses should be converted using Active Directory; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 訊息佇列 (MSMQ) 佇列位址可以由路徑名稱或直接格式名稱所組成。The Message Queuing (MSMQ) queue addresses can consist of path names or direct format names. 如果是使用直接格式名稱，訊息佇列會使用 DNS、NetBIOS 或 IP 解析佇列名稱。With a direct format name, Message Queuing resolves the queue name using DNS, NetBIOS or IP. 如果是路徑名稱，訊息佇列會使用 Active Directory 解析佇列名稱。With a path name, Message Queuing resolves the queue name using Active Directory. 根據預設，[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 佇列的傳輸會將訊息佇列的 URI 轉換成直接格式名稱。By default, the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] queued transport converts the URI of a message queue to a direct format name. 藉由將 屬性設定為 `true`，應用程式可以指定已佇列的傳輸應使用 Active Directory 來解析佇列名稱，而非使用 DNS、NetBIOS 或 IP 來解析。By setting the property to `true`, an application can specify that the queued transport should resolve the queue name using Active Directory rather than DNS, NetBIOS, or IP. ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何設定 屬性。The following code shows how to set the property. [!code-csharp[S_UENetMsmqBinding#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenetmsmqbinding/cs/snippets.cs#6)]
